title: How to insert SIM card in my HP laptop - Quora

response.answer_text: To insert a SIM card, follow these steps: 1. Turn off the computer by using the Shut down command. 2. Close the display. 3. Disconnect all external devices connected to the computer. 4. Unplug the power cord from the AC outlet. 5. Turn the computer upside down on a flat surface, with the battery bay toward you. 6. Remove the battery. 7. Insert the SIM card into the SIM card slot, and then press in on the SIM card until it is firmly seated. Source[1] Footnotes[1] http://h10032.www1.hp.com/ctg/Manual/c04782350

If it has a sim slot, eject the sim tray, put the card in and insert it into the slot. If it doesn’t then you have to find an adapter that’ll allow you to interface a SIM card with USB, USB-C or they also have others that attach to your internal M.2 slot if you have an extra one (some larger laptops do) or to mini-PCI Express which is also internal.
